content.text:
# Draft:List of Warner Bros. International films (1990-1999)

----
The following is a list of foreign films produced, co-produced, and/or distributed by Warner Bros. internationally in the 1990s. This does not include direct-to-video releases or films released under joint ventures. (e.g Warner Sogefilms)
1991
{| class="wikitable sortable" style="width:100%;"
|-
! scope="col" style=width:130px;"| Release Date
! Title
! Country
! Notes
|-
| style="text-align:right;"| January 30, 1991 ||Le Brasier
| France
| distribution only; produced by Flach Film and Solus Productions
|-
| style="text-align:right;"| June 17, 1993 ||Benefit of the Doubt
| Germany
| distribution in Germany, France and the U.K. only; produced by CineVox Filmproduktion and Benefit Productions
|-
| style="text-align:right;"| November 19, 1993 ||My Soul Brother
| Spain
| distribution only; produced by Fernando Colomo PC and Sogetel
|-
| style="text-align:right;"| October 27, 1994 || The NeverEnding Story III
| Germany
| distribution in Germany, France and the U.K. under Warner Bros. Family Entertainment only; produced by CineVox Filmproduktion, Studio Babelsberg and Dieter Geissler Filmproduktion
|-
| style="text-align:right;"| November 16, 1995 ||All Men Are Mortal
| United Kingdom
| distribution only; produced by Nova Films and Sigma Pictures

| style="text-align:right;"| November 23, 1995 ||Deathmaker
